Description: Q2Q transforms improve the estimation of the renewable profiles based on historical data. A repository and additional explanation an analyses can be found at the `Q2Q_repository <https://github.com/cristobal-GC/Q2Q_repository>`_
Path of the file with the q2q transform for this carrier. See ``data_ES/q2q/``.
Path of the file with the q2q transform for this carrier. See ``data_ES/q2q/``.
Allows to customise the electricity demand.
Path of the file with the electricity demand profiles. See ``data_ES/electricity_demand/``.
Path of the file with the electricity demand percentages. See ``data_ES/electricity_demand/``.
Allows to include user-defined interconnections with Portugal and France.
Path of the file with the configuration of the interconnections. See ``data_ES/interconnections/``.
Allows to impose the installed capacity at NUTS 2 level.
Allows to introduce modifications in the cost file.
